name: Het Nkik (V)
Lore: 'Jawa scout. Wants to avenge deaths of relatives killed in stormtrooper assault on sandcrawler. Reegesk pilfered the powerpack from his blaster at a critical moment.',
Text: 'Deploys only on Tatooine. While with another Jawa, your Force drains and Force drain bonuses here may not be canceled. During your control phase, may draw X cards from Reserve Deck, where X = the number of deserts you control with a Jawa.',
